name: Infinity Heist
description:
Infinity Heist is all about speed, precision, and planning. You have a revolver filled with magic bullets, and a train full of robbers to stop - and let's not forget the boss.

Your bullets constantly reappear in a random order, and new bullet types will appear as you play. All enemies are weak to specific bullets, and the train will get harder to fight through as you complete more 'loops'. YEEHAW!

CREDITS
